title: Gated, Ample Cabinet Space, Pantry, BBQ Areas, Large Pool
posting_body: ['Welcome to this Community', 'Where style meets comfort and space meets taste!', 'Conveniently located off the 215 and South Russell Road our community features one of the largest floor plans in the area while also featuring one of the smallest communities in the area.', 'With only 187 gated all corner units featuring their own covered patio/balcony we are sure to meet your every customized need.', 'Come live with us in our most open floor plans and enjoy our oversized pool equipped with bbq grills inside or keep active in our fitness center!', 'Get to know our area even further by exploring the neighborhood with nearby shopping centers and parks all within walking distance!', 'Come enjoy traditional living with St. Clair, You’re invited to be our long term Guests.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 80', 'OR Text', '80', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 982 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- all units come with breakfast bar and open kitchen to living room', '- Ice Maker', '- walk in closets come with shelving.', 'Master bedrooms accommodate king size furniture', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Track Lighting', '- Panoramic Windows', '- Gated', '- open concept living room', '- Vertical Blinds', '- Central AC', '- Ample Cabinet Space', '- large garden tub.', 'master bedroom in the two bedrooms has linen cubicle.1x1 have additional storage space', '- Pantry', 'Community Amenities', '- Large Fire Pit', '- Wi-Fi Access in Clubhouse, Pool, and Fitness
